messages.subject: Everyone unschools WAS: how unschooling works
messages.msgSnippet: -=-=--mind you, I know they re not really free, and will maybe get in trouble if the teacher catches them, but when a person finds learning in whatever he s
messages.messageBody:
-=-=--mind you, I know they're not really free, and will maybe get in trouble if the teacher catches them, but when a person "finds learning" in whatever he's doing, even after school hours or in his daydreams during school hours...isn't that a sort of unschooling?-=-=-=

Naw. That's learning. Learning outside of school. And yes, even schoolaholics do THAT! <g> (They may not think it COUNTS, however! <BWG>)

~Kelly
